title: Largest physical gathering of GD'ers in GD history
body:
Or, at least that's my best guess. Any more than 4 at once before? Considering PAX and other events, probably, but oh well :p

I might be able to upload the professional picture with my wife added in as well later :D

http://puu.sh/cx7SX.jpg

Left: Konpaku Youmu
Top middle: Rule 34
Right: Ion Cannon Karthus
Bottom middle: myself
